title: Ep 172 | Phil and Jase Debate Why We Do Good, Free Will, and the Role of the Holy Spirit
description:
This is one Bible study you don't want to miss. Phil, Jase, and Zach wade deep into what role human beings play when we do good and what role the Holy Spirit plays. They also discuss how the Spirit transforms your heart over time, what sin really is, and how faith works.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
